amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the statutory prohibition on privately funded abortions in overseas military facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 106-624 to restore equal access to health services at overseas military hospitals to servicemen and women and their dependents stationed overseas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 221 (Roll no. 203).
